definition: a flat metal piece (usually a disc) used as money, to form by stamping, punching, or printing
details:
noun
- a flat metal piece (usually a disc) used as money
verb
- to form by stamping, punching, or printing
= example: to form by stamping, punching, or printing
= synonyms: strike
- to make up
= example: to make up
= synonyms: vamp
